title: Fact Find
description: Covers tools, software, documents, and services used to collect, structure, and manage client information at the start of a broker relationship. This includes compliant fact finds, client intake forms, onboarding workflows, data capture processes, and discovery questionnaires used for lending, insurance, and financial advice. Results may include CRM modules, standalone fact find tools, document templates, form builders, and service providers that support compliant client data collection.
synonyms: client onboarding|client intake|client discovery|data capture|client information collection|compliance intake|customer onboarding|financial fact find|broker fact find|loan application intake|needs analysis|discovery questionnaire
exampleQueries: fact find software|broker fact find|client onboarding tools|client intake form|fact find template|CRM fact find|compliant client onboarding|how to collect client information|fact find for brokers|loan application fact find
